properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 8 at 9:34PM PST until February 9 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...None.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph
becoming northeast overnight into Sunday. Waves 1 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM today to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to
capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions
improve. Wave heights will be highest on southern shores tonight,
but will shift to the western shores on Sunday as wind
direction changes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may restrict visibility
around western Nevada.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
